message.body: Hey Sarah, I need some advice. I'm worried about########much and want to help her but I don't know if it will cause her more stress if I check in on her (via txt or phone). Do you think I should just leave her alone for now to focus on school or should I reach out to her?
Sorry to get you involved but I don't know who else to turn to about this.
I can understand your concern but as someone who sees and communicates ######all the time I can assuredly tell u she is good. Time is the best remedy.
Ok thank you for the advice.
